org.multiverse.stms.alpha.mixins
Class FastAtomicObjectMixin

java.lang.Object
  org.multiverse.stms.alpha.mixins.FastAtomicObjectMixin
All Implemented Interfaces:
MultiverseConstants, AlphaAtomicObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ref
public abstract class FastAtomicObjectMixin
extends Object
implements AlphaAtomicObject, MultiverseConstants

Base AlphaAtomicObject implementation that also can be used to transplant methods from during instrumentation.

It is important that the constructor doesn't contain any logic because the constructor code is not copied when this class is 'mixed' in. In the future perhaps this is fixed when there needs to be a constructor. So you are warned.

Author:
Peter Veentjer

load

public AlphaTranlocal load()
Description copied from interface: AlphaAtomicObject
Loads the most recently committed AlphaTranlocal.

Specified by:
load in interface AlphaAtomicObject
Returns:
the most recently written AlphaTranlocal.

load

public final AlphaTranlocal load(long readVersion)
Description copied from interface: AlphaAtomicObject
Loads the AlphaTranlocal with a version equal or smaller than readVersion. It is very important for the implementation to not to return a too old version. If this happens, the system could start to suffer from lost updates (not seeing changes you should have seen).

Specified by:
load in interface AlphaAtomicObject
Parameters:
readVersion - the version of the Tranlocal to read.
Returns:
the loaded Tranlocal. If nothing is committed, null is returned.

getLockOwner

public Transaction getLockOwner()
Description copied from interface: AlphaAtomicObject
Returns the current owner of the lock, or null if AtomicObject is not locked.

Specified by:
getLockOwner in interface AlphaAtomicObject
Returns:
the current owner, or null if lock is free.

tryLock

public final boolean tryLock(Transaction lockOwner)
Description copied from interface: AlphaAtomicObject
Acquires the lock. The lock is only acquired it the lock is free.

Specified by:
tryLock in interface AlphaAtomicObject
Parameters:
lockOwner - the owner of the lock.
Returns:
true if the lock was acquired, false otherwise.

releaseLock

public final void releaseLock(Transaction expectedLockOwner)
Description copied from interface: AlphaAtomicObject
Releases the lock. The lock is only released if the current lockOwner is equal to the expected lock owner. If the lock is free, this call is ignored. If the lock is owned by a different transaction this call is ignored.

It is important that this method always completes. If it doesn't, it could leave memory in an inconsistent state (locked) and therefor useless.

Specified by:
releaseLock in interface AlphaAtomicObject
Parameters:
expectedLockOwner - the expected LockOwner.

storeAndReleaseLock

public final void storeAndReleaseLock(AlphaTranlocal tranlocal,
                                      long writeVersion)
Description copied from interface: AlphaAtomicObject
Stores the the content and releases the lock.

It is important that this call only is made when the lock already was acquired.

Specified by:
storeAndReleaseLock in interface AlphaAtomicObject
Parameters:
tranlocal - the Tranlocal to store.
writeVersion - the version to store the Tranlocal with.

registerRetryListener

public final boolean registerRetryListener(Latch listener,
                                           long minimumWakeupVersion)
Description copied from interface: AlphaAtomicObject
Registers a listener for retrying (the condition variable version for STM's). The Latch is a concurrency structure that can be used to let a thread (transaction) wait for a specific event. In this case we use it to notify the Transaction that the desired update has taken place.

Specified by:
registerRetryListener in interface AlphaAtomicObject
Parameters:
listener - the Latch to register.
minimumWakeupVersion - the minimum version of the data
Returns:
true if the listener was registered on a committed object, false otherwise.
